articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: After first operational launch, here’s the next big test for ULA’s Vulcan rocket - Ars Technica
articles.description: This launch was a big success, but it doesn’t necessarily quash anxieties about ULA’s ability to deliver.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Pebble’s smartwatch is back: Pebble Time 2 specs revealed - TechCrunch
articles.description: The Pebble Time 2's final smartwatch specs are revealed. (And yes, you can call it a "Pebble" again!)
articles.content:
Eric Migicovsky, the original creator of the Pebble smartwatch, on Wednesday showed off the new designs for the upcoming watch, now known as the Pebble Time 2.

articles.author: Pia Singh
articles.title: Stock futures rise as S&P 500 and Nasdaq get set to build on record highs: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The major U.S. indexes are coming off of a strong trading session, which saw the S&P 500 and tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite notch fresh record highs.
articles.content:
Futures tied to the S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 moved higher early Wednesday as investors come off a record-setting session that saw encouraging news on the inflation front.
